title: Caught Between Two Men
description: Jackie Hamilton knows she’s lucky. She has a good job as a lawyer at a good firm in town. There’s girls’ night out with a couple of her high school friends and the occasional weekend with her best friend, Johnny Galloway. Her life is wonderful despite the long hours. She can’t imagine it getting better…until her ex-boyfriend Robert Conroy moves back to town after a two year absence. She gets butterflies in her stomach every time she thinks how Rob wants to pick up where they left off.
author: Dominique Wren
